name: MossMuss
description:
For Go Godot Jam.

Adjust the ecosystem in the jar to make your own moss terrarium. Every time you play repeatedly, you will see apology and rust in the small universe.

Made with: 

  GameEngine

Source: https://github.com/D-first/MossMuss

Game Development: D

Game Design: Dami

Graphics: ady neunzehn

Collaborator: Kyosai
